name: Conveyor Cafe
description:
Chefs will be sending out cafe treats onto a looping conveyor belt. Ensure customers get their correct order by re-routing food through the use of conveyors!

Controls

Left Click  (+ drag)to place tile
Right Click (+ drag)to remove tile
Left Clickto re-place order
Create path to trashto throw out order

How does it fit the "loop" theme?

A conveyor belt itself is a loop! It uses motorized pulleys that loop over a stretch of thick/durable material. In this game, the conveyor belts on the outer edges are also structured/placed in a loop.
